fields.name: Grid size X
fields.help: Tells ct.place how to spacially group copies. This should be at least as large as the horizontal side of the biggest colliding sprite of your game.

fields.name: Grid size Y
fields.help: Tells ct.place how to spacially group copies. This should be at least as large as the vertical size of the biggest colliding sprite of your game.

fields.name: Debug mode
fields.help: Displays collision shapes, collision groups and partitions. It will also write additional keys to most colliding objects. Doesn't work on hidden objects.
